titles.title: Bring our Small Businesses Back Act
Bring our Small Businesses Back Act
To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to create a grant program to fund existing consumer voucher matching programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Bring our Small Businesses Back Act
This bill provides grants for local governments to fund existing consumer voucher matching programs, under which funds contributed by individuals are matched by the local government to assist small businesses affected by COVID-19.
